dogmas.description: You may return three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a <age>3</age> card
You may return a <age>3</age> card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a 3 <age>1</age> cards
You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards <splay>left</splay>
Draw and reveal a <age>1</age>. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a <age>1</age>
<demand /> you transfer a top card with a <icon>1</icon> from your board to my board if you have at least four <icon>1</icon> cards on your board! If you do, draw a <age>1</age>
